channel.title: Graph on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Graph on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 787 Cheapest Flights Within K Stops
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 787 Question There are n cities connected by some number of flights.

item.title: Problem 743 Network Delay Time
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 743 Question You are given a network of n nodes, labeled from 1 to n.

item.title: Problem 2976 Minimum Cost to Convert String I
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem Question You are given two 0-indexed strings source and target, both of length n and consisting of lowercase English letters.

item.title: Problem 2192 All Ancestors of a Node in a DAG
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2192 Question You are given a positive integer n representing the number of nodes of a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG).

item.title: Problem 2285 Maximum Total Importance of Roads
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2285 Question You are given an integer n denoting the number of cities in a country.

item.title: Problem 1791 Find Center of Star Graph
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1791 Question There is an undirected star graph consisting of n nodes labeled from 1 to n.

item.title: Problem 752 Open the Lock
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 752 Question You have a lock in front of you with 4 circular wheels.

item.title: Problem 1971 Find if Path Exists in Graph
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1971 Question There is a bi-directional graph with n vertices, where each vertex is labeled from 0 to n-1 (inclusive).
